Params: {2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I think you might like it, so I... brought it back for you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "It's the first time you've given me a plushie, I'm so happy!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Luna takes the plushie and begins to check it out.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If you ever come back too late, I can go to sleep hugging it!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But my favorite is still Lucia! Hehe!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Luna sits on her bed and plays with the plushie as Lucia walks before their food stash to store the food she earned today.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "The food... Why's there so little left...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Luna, did you eat some of it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I didn't eat it, just... I lent it to... people... the last few days...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'All the food and you... lent it to people?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia steps back, stupefied. She mutters to herself silently.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's all my fault for not checking the food crate...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'All the food supplies are going to be cut off...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's why I've been coming home so late recently...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Luna... with this much food... We won't be able to...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But... they said they would return it to us afterward...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Lucia grabs Luna's hand and promptly rushes outside."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Whoever borrowed food from Luna, come out!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crowd merely gazes at the two, not a soul daring to make a sound.'}
{2: 'Little Boy', 3: "I already ate most of it... What's left is... only barely enough for myself..."}
{2: 'Little Boy', 3: "Do whatever you want with me, I still won't give it back to you!"}
{2: 'Little Boy', 3: "I'm just trying to live! What's wrong with that?!"}
{3: 'The boy could not bear to look at Lucia, and instead huddles himself up, not showing any emotion.'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: 'Well... No one to blame but your own gullible selves.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nun', 3: "Don't expect there to be any law-upholding police or judge around here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia glares at the curled-up boy, her fists unconsciously nearing the knife she always kept close to her.'}
